snippet: President Mohamed Morsi tried to name the prosecutor, a holdover from the Mubarak era, ambassador to the Vatican.
abstract: Abdel Meguid Mahmoud refuses publicly to leave his job as Egypt's chief prosecutor after Pres Mohamed Morsi seeks to appoint him ambassador to the Vatican; skirmish is one of the first in long-awaited battle between Islamists who have risen to power and secular-minded legal establishment left over from era of former Pres Hosni Mubarak.
lead_paragraph: President Mohamed Morsi tried to name the prosecutor, a holdover from the Mubarak era, ambassador to the Vatican.

headline.seo: Egypt’s Chief Prosecutor Refuses Morsi’s Effort to Oust Him
headline.main: Egypt’s Chief Prosecutor Resists President’s Effort to Oust Him
headline.print_headline: Egypt’s Chief Prosecutor Resists President’s Effort to Oust Him
